item.title: Form Handler Feature
item.description: Form submit RF Puppeteer allow you to simple interact with html forms with following keywords: Input Text Click Element Click Button Click Image Click Link Example: Select dropdown item Select value from dropdown list need to use folling keywords: Select From List By Label Select From List By Value Example:
